revised_title: Numerical Solution of Integral Equations in Crack Propagation and Elastic Wave Diffraction
tldr: The author presents a method to numerically solve integral equations related to crack propagation and elastic wave diffraction in seismology. The study focuses on idealized models of earthquakes and fault planes, providing a mathematical framework for understanding the mechanics of earthquakes and calculating the relative displacement across fault planes. The results are presented graphically and can be applied to two-dimensional problems in anti-plane and plane strain.
